mapper.select: SELECT hospital_seq, hospital_id, hospital_name, hospital_address, hospital_tel_num FROM hospital_data WHERE hospital_status_code = '01' ORDER BY hospital_seq

SELECT hospital_seq, hospital_id, hospital_name, hospital_address, hospital_tel_num FROM hospital_data WHERE hospital_status_code = '01' AND hospital_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{value},'%') ORDER BY hospital_seq
SELECT hospital_seq, hospital_id, hospital_name, hospital_address, hospital_tel_num FROM hospital_data WHERE hospital_status_code = '01' AND hospital_seq = #{hospitalSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO hospital_data ( hospital_seq, hospital_id, hospital_name, hospital_address, hospital_status_code, hospital_tel_num ) VALUES ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(hospital_seq), 0) + 1 FROM hospital_data A), #{hospitalId}, #{hospitalName}, #{hospitalAddress}, #{hospitalStatusCode}, #{hospitalTelNum} )
